LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalKing.label: Horned cap
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalKing.description: Decorated hardened leather cap. Often worn by the most revered and skilled combatants of Norbal communities
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalSagecowl.label: cowl
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalSagecowl.description: Hardened leather cowl. Often worn by the sages of the Norbal communities
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalArcher.label: Skullcap
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalArcher.description: Adorned cap, protects the entire head.
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalThunder.label: Winged skullcap
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalThunder.description: Adorned cap, protects the entire head.
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalWarrior.label: Bascinet
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalWarrior.description: Your usual bascinet, protects the entire head.
